comments:
While investigating bug 24793, I need to bring PDE-UI source into my workspace. 
Doing so, I encountered an NPE.

* My workspace contained ant & debug plug-ins as source
* The other plug-ins were imported into my workspace as binaries
* I turned off auto-build
* Deleted the org.eclipse.pde.ui plugin (and removed contents from disk)
* Added org.eclipse.pde.ui as source from CVS
* Turned on auto-build
* Got NPE

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 Jan 24, 2003 08:59:11.97
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

A full build seems to have put me back on track.

We know about this defect - Wassim, please resolve it as a duplicate to the one 
you fixed.

This bug is fixed in the I-22030122 build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 29907 ***
